short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple mp3 converter. Support the conversion of local and online media files to MP3 format.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 一款简单的MP3提取器，支持本地和在线媒体文件转换为mp3格式

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a quick and easy MP3 Converter & Downloader that can easily convert video sources to MP3 audio and add any ID3 tags. It supports the conversion of local video files to audio, and also enables the extraction of audio of videos from online media.
The main features: 
- Support online audio extraction of videos from popular websites.
- Support mp4, avi, ogg, m4a, webm, wma, mkv, mov and other formats to MP3.
- Support for extracting audio from local video files.
- ID3 tags can be added.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
这是一款快速简单的MP3转换器&下载器，可以轻松地将视频资源转换为MP3音频，并且可任意添加ID3标签。支持本地视频文件转换为音频，也可实现在线视频的音频提取。
插件特点：
1. 支持在线网站视频的音频在线提取。
2. 支持mp4、avi、ogg、m4a、webm、wma、mkv、 mov等格式的文件转为MP3。
3. 支持提取本地视频文件的音频
4. 可自由添加ID3标签
